Part of the joy of watching the parade for me, is seeing people of all shapes, sizes, races, with whatever background, walking showing off their jobs.
It's 2017. We should not be excluding one at the benefit of another. I hope the TPS bills the hell out of this parade this year.
Thus the reason we need to be testing the workers. Sorry but if you're in a job where you can potentially harm thousands of people, you need to get help.
